result.execSummary:
Roderick J. Johnson II was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Roderick J. Johnson II was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roderick J. Johnson II

records.addlTxt: Defendant Roderick J. Johnson in court in custody with attorney Adam Thomas Witt.  Richard Jay Sullivan appeared with Intern Christa Johnson for the State of Wisconsin. Governors Warrant presented. Court orders Extradition; Bond Revoked.
Defendant Roderick J. Johnson in court with attorney Adam Thomas Witt.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for July 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Roderick J. Johnson in court with attorney Adam Thomas Witt.  Richard Jay Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deft REQUESTS GOVERNORS WARRANT. REFUSES TO WAIVE EXTRADITION.  Status conference scheduled for June 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Adam Thomas Witt in court, defendant Roderick J. Johnson not in court, in custody.  Gerald Anthony Urbik appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deft Refuses to WAIVE EXTRADITION; Deft Requests GOVERNORS WARRANT.  Status conference scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Roderick J. Johnson in court in custody with attorney Valerie A. Zisman.  Cheniqua White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Continued Extradition Hearing 03-17-2015 at 8:30am "B"
